duck: KISS principle - KISS is an acronym for the design principle articulated by Kelly Johnson, Keep it simple, stupid!.

Minimalism - Minimalism describes movements in various forms of art and design, especially visual art and music, where the work is set out to expose the essence or identity of a subject through eliminating a...
Complexity - In general usage, complexity tends to be used to characterize something with many parts in intricate arrangement.
simplicity definition: the state of being simple, uncomplicated, or uncompounded.
Occam's razor - Occam's razor is the law of parsimony, economy, or succinctness.
Elegance - Elegance is a synonym for beauty that has come to acquire the additional connotations of unusual effectiveness and simplicity.
Simplicity is the state or quality of being simple.
Simple living - Simple living encompasses a number of different voluntary practices to simplify one's lifestyle.
